description: APPLICATION FOR THE ERECTION OF A REAR AND SIDE ROOF ADDITION IN ZINC
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Materials to be Approved - No development shall take place until details of particulars and samples of the materials to be used on all external faces of the development hereby permitted, including proposed zinc cladding and fenestration have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. No works which are the subject of this condition shall be carried out until the details are approved, and the development shall be carried out in full accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 3 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: [4.201.1, 4.202.1, 4.203.1, 4.204.1, 2.404.1, Site Location Plan, 3.202.1 ]

Condition : 4 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant -Approved Schemes

2. Providing written policies and guidance, which is available to view on LBM's website.

4. Determining applications in a timely manner including providing a fast track service, details to be found on Get a quicker planning decision on LBM's website.

In this instance:
i) The application was acceptable as submitted, and approved with an agreed determination date.
